text: kenny rogers is the just-launched "as an entertainer, i look at the internet as the future venue for many forms of entertainment," rogers said. "it is a powerful way to bring fun and safe entertainment to millions of people at the same time." rogers scored hits with players must download software to play games such as caribbean poker, roulette, blackjack, video slots, video poker, baccarat, and craps.but rogers' american fans won't be allowed to play for money. as a press release notes, there's still the matter of "pending clarification of legal issues" in the united states.the kenny rogers casino uses cryptologic's ecash system, which can handle wagers for players as small as a single penny per transaction. winnings are distributed to players by check, money order, or western union quick pay in us dollars. the site was developed by max rubin, a las vegas gaming expert and author, and is run in conjunction with
